@id.description: Unique identifier of this source in our systems. Useful for debugging

@person_id.description: The id of the person this source belongs to.

@sponsored.description: Indicating whether additional data from this source is available behind a website paywall. Omitted if false.

@origin_url.description: The url of the web page holding this information. Only shown if the data is available online.

@match.description: 0-1. The match score of the person this source belongs to.

@premium.description: Whether this is a premium data source. Omitted if false.

display.description: The full address for display purposes. Response only.
